class src.multiweatherapi.campbell.CampbellParam(username=None, user_passwd=None, station_id=None, station_lid=None, start_datetime=None, end_datetime=None, tz=None, json_file=None, binding_ver=None)¶

Bases: object

A class used to represent Campbell API parameters

username¶

Login account username to campbell-cloud

Type:

str

user_passwd¶

Login account password to campbell-cloud

Type:

str

Username and Password dict (internally generated)

Type:

dict

access_token¶

API access token generated using username & password (internally generated)

Type:

str

kc_id¶

Alphanumeric user ID from user details (internally generated)

Type:

str

organization_id¶

Alphanumeric organization_id from user details (internally generated)

Type:

str

measurements¶

The name or names of available measurements of the station (comma separated str, internally generated)

Type:

str

station_id¶

Alphanumeric ID of the station (for v3 APIs)

Type:

str

station_lid¶

Alphanumeric Legacy ID of the station (for v2 APIs)

Type:

str

str

Type:

datetime (UTC expected)

Return readings with timestamps ≤ end_time. Specify end_time in str. (2021-08-31, 2021-08-31)

datetime (UTC expected)

src.multiweatherapi.rainwise module¶

class src.multiweatherapi.rainwise.RainwiseParam(username=None, sid=None, pid=None, mac=None, ret_form='json', interval=1, start_datetime=None, end_datetime=None, tz=None, json_file=None, binding_ver=None)¶

Bases: object

A class used to represent Rainwise API parameters

username¶

Registered group name (same as MAC)

Type:

str

sid¶

Site id, assigned by Rainwise

Type:

str

pid¶

Password id, assigned by Rainwise

Type:

str

mac¶

MAC of the weather station, Must be in the group assigned to username

Type:

str

ret_form¶

Values xml or json; returns the data as JSON or XML

Type:

str, optional (default json)

interval¶

Data aggregation interval, 1, 5, 10, 15, 30, 60 minute intervals

Type:

int, optional (default 1 min)

start_datetime_org¶

src.multiweatherapi.utilities module¶

class src.multiweatherapi.utilities.Utilities¶

Bases: object

A class of helper utilities to reduce replication of code across the multiweatherapi modules.

case_insensitive_key(this_key)¶

A class to look for keys in a dictionary, disregarding case.

This method is used to look for a particular key in the response string returned by the vendor API call. Some vendors use ‘Message’, and others use ‘message’.

Parameters:

  • this_dict (dict) – The dictionary containing the response from the vendor API.

  • this_key (str) – They key we are looking for in the response.

Returns:

resp_raw – The value associated with this_key.

Return type:

str

convert_to_dict(davisParm=None)¶
create_error_response(parms, readings, error_msg)¶

Create an error response that will get placed in the resp_raw field.

This method came about because it was decided that the raw_data table can double as a log of sorts. Therefore, it was necessary to change how mwapi handled exceptions. Instead of throwing an exception, mwapi will call this method to create a list that can be

set_date()¶
